title: Data Sensitivity Level
description: Standardized sensitivity level enumeration for data classification across 3leaps ecosystems. Levels range from 0 (Public) to 6 (Eyes Only), with UNKNOWN for unclassified data.

labels.description: Human-readable labels for each sensitivity level

ordinal_mapping.description: Ordinal values for comparator operations (lte/gte). Higher values indicate more restrictive sensitivity.

level_descriptions.description: Brief descriptions of each sensitivity level

unknown.const: Unclassified; isolate until classified within 24 hours

0-public.const: Public domain or intended for public distribution

1-confidential.const: Internal but non-sensitive; NDA-level protection, access logged

4-personal.const: NPPII or secrets; vault-managed only, real-time monitoring

6-eyes-only.const: Legal hold or extreme restriction; immutable storage, exec authorization
